dynamic-hibernate.query:
SELECT traceStorage_Id, name, ip, port, system_Status, manual_Status FROM CSL_TRACE_STORAGE WHERE 1=1 #if($traceStorage_Id) AND traceStorage_Id = :traceStorage_Id #end #if($name) AND name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND port = :port #end #if($system_Status) AND system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND manual_Status = :manual_Status #end
ORDER BY traceStorage_Id desc
